Introduction

UpTown was a South Korean hip-hop group formed by RIAK in 1996. They debuted on January 14, 1997 with the studio album "Represent". The group disbanded in 2000 due to the departure of, and later reformed in 2006, making group activities until 2010.

After a substantial hiatus, they made their comeback in 2023 with their latest album "Back II Analog".
